properties.value: {"openapi":"3.0.1","info":{"title":"CGI eAddressRegistry - Internal Maintenance","description":"Search for one or more eAddresses.","version":"1.0.0"},"servers":[{"url":"http://localhost:7071/api"}],"paths":{"/internal/staging/organizations":{"post":{"tags":["internal-staging"],"summary":"Add organizations to staging","operationId":"AppendStaging","requestBody":{"description":"List of Organizations","content":{"json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/organization"}}}}},"responses":{"200":{"description":"Submission complete.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}}},"400":{"description":"Wrong Content-Encoding or bad json format.","content":{"text/plain":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}}},"503":{"description":"The service is busy. Import already in progress.","content":{"text/plain":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}}}},"security":[{"function_key":[]}]},"get":{"tags":["internal-staging"],"summary":"Search for organizations in staging data","operationId":"SearchStaging","parameters":[{"name":"organizationIdentifier","in":"query","description":"Value that matches one of the identifiers for an organization.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Found organizations matching the organizationIdentifier.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/organization"}}}}},"400":{"description":"Organization identifier is missing.","content":{"text/plain":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}}},"404":{"description":"Not found.","content":{"text/plain":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}}}},"security":[{"function_key":[]}]}},"/internal/staging":{"delete":{"tags":["internal-staging"],"summary":"Delete all data in staging. Number of organizations in staging and import status.","operationId":"GetStagingInformation","responses":{"200":{"description":"Information about staged data.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/stagingMeta"}}}}},"security":[{"function_key":[]}]},"post":{"tags":["internal-staging"],"summary":"Publish staging data","operationId":"PublishStaging","requestBody":{"description":"Set published to true to publish staging data.","content":{"json":{"schema":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/publishStaging"}}}},"responses":{"200":{"description":"Published.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request. Published must be of type bool and set to true.","content":{"text/plain":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}}}},"security":[{"function_key":[]}]}}},"components":{"schemas":{"eAddress":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name for the eAddress organization. This can differ from the Organization/Name for multiple addresses within the official organization."},"id":{"type":"array","items":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/eAddressId"},"description":"The identification of the organization and type of the identification."},"serviceID":{"$ref":"#/components/schemas/eAddressId"},"supportAttachments":{"type":"boolean","description":"Defines if the address can support sending/receiving attachments. If element is not present the default interpretation is that the address supports attachments."},"context":{"enum":["EINVOICE","ORDERS","ORDRSP","DESADV","PRICAT","OTHER"],"type":"string","description":"Defines the context of the eAddress within the organization. If Context is not defined the eAddress is considered to be a \u0022EINVOICE\u0022 address."},"direction":{"enum":["SEND","RECEIVE"],"type":"string","description":"Valid types are \u0022SEND\u0022 and \u0022RECEIVE\u0022. If Direction is not defined the eAddress is considered to be a \u0022SEND\u0022 address."},"handledByCGI":{"type":"boolean","description":"Defines if CGI is able to handle this address.
